sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const ContactSection: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Section Header */}

Get in
Touch

Ready to start your tech career journey? Contact us for a free consultation and personalized guidance.

{/* Left Column - Contact Info */}
{/* Contact Methods */}

Contact Information

Phone

+91 90123 45374

Mon-Sat: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM

Email

connect@cloudblogger.in

Website

www.cloudblogger.com

Online learning platform

{/* Mode & Timings */}

Mode & Timings

Learning Mode

Online Mode Live Sessions

Class Timings

Weekdays (Mon-Fri) 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM
Weekends (Sat-Sun) 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM
Flexible Sessions Available

Support Hours

Technical Support 24/7
Career Counseling Mon-Sat: 10 AM - 6 PM
{/* Right Column - Contact Form */}

Book Free Consultation

We'll get back to you within 24 hours

{/* Quick Contact */}

Need Immediate Assistance?

Call us directly or send us a WhatsApp message for instant support.

Call Now WhatsApp
{/* Footer */}
Â© 2024 Cloud Blogger. All rights reserved.
); }; export default ContactSection;
